alias.pg: SELECT ("customer"."age" NOT BETWEEN $1 AND $2) AS "ageNotBetween" FROM "customer"
alias.sqlite: SELECT ("customer"."age" NOT BETWEEN $1 AND $2) AS "ageNotBetween" FROM "customer"
alias.mysql: SELECT (`customer`.`age` NOT BETWEEN ? AND ?) AS `ageNotBetween` FROM `customer`

binary-clause.pg: SELECT (("post"."id" + $1) + "post"."content") FROM "post" WHERE ("post"."userId" NOT IN (SELECT "customer"."id" FROM "customer"))
binary-clause.sqlite: SELECT (("post"."id" + $1) + "post"."content") FROM "post" WHERE ("post"."userId" NOT IN (SELECT "customer"."id" FROM "customer"))
binary-clause.mysql: SELECT ((`post`.`id` + ?) + `post`.`content`) FROM `post` WHERE (`post`.`userId` NOT IN (SELECT `customer`.`id` FROM `customer`))
binary-clause.mssql: SELECT (([post].[id] + @1) + [post].[content]) FROM [post] WHERE ([post].[userId] NOT IN (SELECT [customer].[id] FROM [customer]))
binary-clause.oracle: SELECT (("post"."id" + :1) + "post"."content") FROM "post" WHERE ("post"."userId" NOT IN (SELECT "customer"."id" FROM "customer"))

case.pg: SELECT (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE $5 END) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE $5 END) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (CASE WHEN ? THEN ? WHEN ? THEN ? ELSE ? END) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN @1 WHEN 0=1 THEN @2 ELSE @3 END) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN :1 WHEN 0=1 THEN :2 ELSE :3 END) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT ("customer"."age" + (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE $5 END)) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT ("customer"."age" + (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE $5 END)) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (`customer`.`age` + (CASE WHEN ? THEN ? WHEN ? THEN ? ELSE ? END)) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT ([customer].[age] + (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN @1 WHEN 0=1 THEN @2 ELSE @3 END)) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT ("customer"."age" + (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN :1 WHEN 0=1 THEN :2 ELSE :3 END)) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT ((CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE $5 END) + $6) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT ((CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE $5 END) + $6) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT ((CASE WHEN ? THEN ? WHEN ? THEN ? ELSE ? END) + ?) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT ((CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN @1 WHEN 0=1 THEN @2 ELSE @3 END) + @4) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT ((CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN :1 WHEN 0=1 THEN :2 ELSE :3 END) + :4) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE ("customer"."age" BETWEEN $5 AND $6) END) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE ("customer"."age" BETWEEN $5 AND $6) END) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (CASE WHEN ? THEN ? WHEN ? THEN ? ELSE (`customer`.`age` BETWEEN ? AND ?) END) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN @1 WHEN 0=1 THEN @2 ELSE ([customer].[age] BETWEEN @3 AND @4) END) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN :1 WHEN 0=1 THEN :2 ELSE ("customer"."age" BETWEEN :3 AND :4) END) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 END) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT (CASE WHEN $1 THEN $2 WHEN $3 THEN $4 END) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (CASE WHEN ? THEN ? WHEN ? THEN ? END) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN @1 WHEN 0=1 THEN @2 END) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT (CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN :1 WHEN 0=1 THEN :2 END) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN ($1, $2, $3)) THEN $4 WHEN ("customer"."age" <= $5) THEN $6 ELSE $7 END) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN ($1, $2, $3)) THEN $4 WHEN ("customer"."age" <= $5) THEN $6 ELSE $7 END) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (CASE WHEN (`customer`.`age` IN (?, ?, ?)) THEN ? WHEN (`customer`.`age` <= ?) THEN ? ELSE ? END) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT (CASE WHEN ([customer].[age] IN (@1, @2, @3)) THEN @4 WHEN ([customer].[age] <= @5) THEN @6 ELSE @7 END) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN (:1, :2, :3)) THEN :4 WHEN ("customer"."age" <= :5) THEN :6 ELSE :7 END) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN ($1, $2, $3)) THEN $4 WHEN ("customer"."age" <= $5) THEN $6 END) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN ($1, $2, $3)) THEN $4 WHEN ("customer"."age" <= $5) THEN $6 END) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (CASE WHEN (`customer`.`age` IN (?, ?, ?)) THEN ? WHEN (`customer`.`age` <= ?) THEN ? END) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT (CASE WHEN ([customer].[age] IN (@1, @2, @3)) THEN @4 WHEN ([customer].[age] <= @5) THEN @6 END) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN (:1, :2, :3)) THEN :4 WHEN ("customer"."age" <= :5) THEN :6 END) FROM "customer"

case.pg: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN ($1, $2, $3)) THEN ("customer"."age" + $4) WHEN ("customer"."age" <= $5) THEN ("customer"."age" - $6) END) FROM "customer"
case.sqlite: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN ($1, $2, $3)) THEN ("customer"."age" + $4) WHEN ("customer"."age" <= $5) THEN ("customer"."age" - $6) END) FROM "customer"
case.mysql: SELECT (CASE WHEN (`customer`.`age` IN (?, ?, ?)) THEN (`customer`.`age` + ?) WHEN (`customer`.`age` <= ?) THEN (`customer`.`age` - ?) END) FROM `customer`
case.mssql: SELECT (CASE WHEN ([customer].[age] IN (@1, @2, @3)) THEN ([customer].[age] + @4) WHEN ([customer].[age] <= @5) THEN ([customer].[age] - @6) END) FROM [customer]
case.oracle: SELECT (CASE WHEN ("customer"."age" IN (:1, :2, :3)) THEN ("customer"."age" + :4) WHEN ("customer"."age" <= :5) THEN ("customer"."age" - :6) END) FROM "customer"

clause-ordering.mssql: SELECT [user].[name], [post].[content] FROM [user] INNER JOIN [post] ON ([user].[id] = [post].[userId]) WHERE ([user].[name] = @1)

create-table.sqlite: CREATE TABLE "replies" ("id" int PRIMARY KEY, "blog_id" int, "post_id" int, "user_id" int, FOREIGN KEY ( "blog_id", "user_id" ) REFERENCES "users" ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT "posts_idx" FOREIGN KEY ( "blog_id", "post_id" ) REFERENCES "posts" ( "blog_id", "id" ) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE SET DEFAULT)

delete.mysql: DELETE `user` FROM `user` INNER JOIN `post` ON (`post`.`userId` = `user`.`id`) WHERE (`post`.`content` = ?)
delete.oracle: DELETE "user" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("post"."userId" = "user"."id") WHERE ("post"."content" = :1)

delete.oracle: DELETE FROM "post" WHERE (("post"."content" = :1) OR ("post"."content" IS NULL))

group-by.mysql: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(`post`.`content`) AS `post contents` FROM `post` GROUP BY `post`.`userId`

having.pg: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") AS "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > $1)
having.sqlite: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") AS "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > $1)
having.mysql: SELECT `post`.`userId`, COUNT(`post`.`content`) AS `content_count` FROM `post` GROUP BY `post`.`userId` HAVING (`post`.`userId` > ?)
having.mssql: SELECT [post].[userId], COUNT([post].[content]) AS [content_count] FROM [post] GROUP BY [post].[userId] HAVING ([post].[userId] > @1)
having.oracle: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > :1)

having.pg: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") AS "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > $1) AND ("post"."userId" < $2)
having.sqlite: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") AS "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > $1) AND ("post"."userId" < $2)

having.mssql: SELECT [post].[userId], COUNT([post].[content]) AS [content_count] FROM [post] GROUP BY [post].[userId] HAVING ([post].[userId] > @1) AND ([post].[userId] < @2)
having.oracle: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > :1) AND ("post"."userId" < :2)

having.pg: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") AS "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > $1) AND ("post"."userId" < $2)

having.oracle: SELECT "post"."userId", COUNT("post"."content") "content_count" FROM "post" GROUP BY "post"."userId" HAVING ("post"."userId" > :1) AND ("post"."userId" < :2)

insert.pg: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "user"."id" FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" LIKE $1)
insert.sqlite: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "user"."id" FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" LIKE $1)
insert.mysql: INSERT INTO `post` (`userId`) SELECT `user`.`id` FROM `user` WHERE (`user`.`name` LIKE ?)
insert.oracle: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "user"."id" FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" LIKE :1)

insert.pg: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "post"."userId" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") WHERE ("post"."tags" LIKE $1)
insert.sqlite: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "post"."userId" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") WHERE ("post"."tags" LIKE $1)
insert.mysql: INSERT INTO `post` (`userId`) SELECT `post`.`userId` FROM `user` INNER JOIN `post` ON (`user`.`id` = `post`.`userId`) WHERE (`post`.`tags` LIKE ?)
insert.mssql: INSERT INTO [post] ([userId]) SELECT [post].[userId] FROM [user] INNER JOIN [post] ON ([user].[id] = [post].[userId]) WHERE ([post].[tags] LIKE @1)
insert.oracle: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "post"."userId" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") WHERE ("post"."tags" LIKE :1)

insert.mysql: INSERT INTO `post` (`content`, `userId`) VALUES (?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `post`.`content` = ?

insert.pg: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "user"."id" FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."id"
insert.sqlite: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "user"."id" FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."id"
insert.mysql: INSERT INTO `post` (`userId`) SELECT `user`.`id` FROM `user` ORDER BY `user`.`id`
insert.mssql: INSERT INTO [post] ([userId]) SELECT [user].[id] FROM [user] ORDER BY [user].[id]
insert.oracle: INSERT INTO "post" ("userId") SELECT "user"."id" FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."id"

join.pg: SELECT "user"."name", "post"."content", "comment"."text" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") INNER JOIN "comment" ON ("post"."id" = "comment"."postId")
join.sqlite: SELECT "user"."name", "post"."content", "comment"."text" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") INNER JOIN "comment" ON ("post"."id" = "comment"."postId")
join.mysql: SELECT `user`.`name`, `post`.`content`, `comment`.`text` FROM `user` INNER JOIN `post` ON (`user`.`id` = `post`.`userId`) INNER JOIN `comment` ON (`post`.`id` = `comment`.`postId`)
join.mssql: SELECT [user].[name], [post].[content], [comment].[text] FROM [user] INNER JOIN [post] ON ([user].[id] = [post].[userId]) INNER JOIN [comment] ON ([post].[id] = [comment].[postId])
join.oracle: SELECT "user"."name", "post"."content", "comment"."text" FROM "user" INNER JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") INNER JOIN "comment" ON ("post"."id" = "comment"."postId")

join.pg: SELECT "user"."name", "post"."content" FROM "user" LEFT JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") LEFT JOIN "comment" ON ("post"."id" = "comment"."postId")
join.sqlite: SELECT "user"."name", "post"."content" FROM "user" LEFT JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") LEFT JOIN "comment" ON ("post"."id" = "comment"."postId")
join.mysql: SELECT `user`.`name`, `post`.`content` FROM `user` LEFT JOIN `post` ON (`user`.`id` = `post`.`userId`) LEFT JOIN `comment` ON (`post`.`id` = `comment`.`postId`)
join.mssql: SELECT [user].[name], [post].[content] FROM [user] LEFT JOIN [post] ON ([user].[id] = [post].[userId]) LEFT JOIN [comment] ON ([post].[id] = [comment].[postId])
join.oracle: SELECT "user"."name", "post"."content" FROM "user" LEFT JOIN "post" ON ("user"."id" = "post"."userId") LEFT JOIN "comment" ON ("post"."id" = "comment"."postId")

join.pg: SELECT "user"."name", "subposts"."content" FROM "user" INNER JOIN (SELECT "post"."content", "post"."userId" AS "subpostUserId" FROM "post") "subposts" ON ("user"."id" = "subposts"."subpostUserId")
join.sqlite: SELECT "user"."name", "subposts"."content" FROM "user" INNER JOIN (SELECT "post"."content", "post"."userId" AS "subpostUserId" FROM "post") "subposts" ON ("user"."id" = "subposts"."subpostUserId")
join.mysql: SELECT `user`.`name`, `subposts`.`content` FROM `user` INNER JOIN (SELECT `post`.`content`, `post`.`userId` AS `subpostUserId` FROM `post`) `subposts` ON (`user`.`id` = `subposts`.`subpostUserId`)
join.mssql: SELECT [user].[name], [subposts].[content] FROM [user] INNER JOIN (SELECT [post].[content], [post].[userId] AS [subpostUserId] FROM [post]) [subposts] ON ([user].[id] = [subposts].[subpostUserId])
join.oracle: SELECT "user"."name", "subposts"."content" FROM "user" INNER JOIN (SELECT "post"."content", "post"."userId" "subpostUserId" FROM "post") "subposts" ON ("user"."id" = "subposts"."subpostUserId")

limit-and-offset.pg: SELECT "user".* FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."name" LIMIT 3 OFFSET 6
limit-and-offset.sqlite: SELECT "user".* FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."name" LIMIT 3 OFFSET 6
limit-and-offset.mysql: SELECT `user`.* FROM `user` ORDER BY `user`.`name` LIMIT 3 OFFSET 6
limit-and-offset.mssql: SELECT [user].* FROM [user] ORDER BY [user].[name] OFFSET 6 ROWS FETCH NEXT 3 ROWS ONLY
SELECT [user].* FROM [user] ORDER BY [user].[name] OFFSET 10 ROWS
limit-and-offset.oracle: SELECT "user".* FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."name" OFFSET 10 ROWS

limit-and-offset.pg: SELECT "user".* FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" = $1) OFFSET (SELECT FLOOR(RANDOM() * COUNT(*)) FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" = $2)) LIMIT 1
limit-and-offset.sqlite: SELECT "user".* FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" = $1) OFFSET (SELECT FLOOR(RANDOM() * COUNT(*)) FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" = $2)) LIMIT 1
limit-and-offset.mysql: SELECT `user`.* FROM `user` WHERE (`user`.`name` = ?) OFFSET (SELECT FLOOR(RANDOM() * COUNT(*)) FROM `user` WHERE (`user`.`name` = ?)) LIMIT 1
limit-and-offset.oracle: SELECT "user".* FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" = :1) OFFSET (SELECT FLOOR(RANDOM() * COUNT(*)) FROM "user" WHERE ("user"."name" = :2)) ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY

literal.pg: SELECT COUNT("subquery_for_count"."count_column") AS "count_column_count" FROM (SELECT 1 AS "count_column" FROM "user" LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20) "subquery_for_count"
literal.sqlite: SELECT COUNT("subquery_for_count"."count_column") AS "count_column_count" FROM (SELECT 1 AS "count_column" FROM "user" LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20) "subquery_for_count"
literal.mysql: SELECT COUNT(`subquery_for_count`.`count_column`) AS `count_column_count` FROM (SELECT 1 AS `count_column` FROM `user` LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20) `subquery_for_count`
literal.oracle: SELECT COUNT("subquery_for_count"."count_column") "count_column_count" FROM (SELECT 1 "count_column" FROM "user" OFFSET 20 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY) "subquery_for_count"

matches.pg: SELECT "post"."id", TS_RANK_CD("post"."content", TO_TSQUERY($1)) AS "rank" FROM "post" WHERE ("post"."content" @@ TO_TSQUERY($2)) ORDER BY TS_RANK_CD("post"."content", TO_TSQUERY($3)) DESC

namespace.pg: SELECT "u"."name" FROM "user" AS "u" INNER JOIN "post" AS "p" ON (("u"."id" = "p"."userId") AND ("p"."id" = $1))
namespace.sqlite: SELECT "u"."name" FROM "user" AS "u" INNER JOIN "post" AS "p" ON (("u"."id" = "p"."userId") AND ("p"."id" = $1))
namespace.mysql: SELECT `u`.`name` FROM `user` AS `u` INNER JOIN `post` AS `p` ON ((`u`.`id` = `p`.`userId`) AND (`p`.`id` = ?))
namespace.mssql: SELECT [u].[name] FROM [user] AS [u] INNER JOIN [post] AS [p] ON (([u].[id] = [p].[userId]) AND ([p].[id] = @1))
namespace.oracle: SELECT "u"."name" FROM "user" "u" INNER JOIN "post" "p" ON (("u"."id" = "p"."userId") AND ("p"."id" = :1))

namespace.pg: SELECT "p"."content", "u"."name" FROM "user" AS "u" INNER JOIN "post" AS "p" ON (("u"."id" = "p"."userId") AND ("p"."content" IS NOT NULL))
namespace.sqlite: SELECT "p"."content", "u"."name" FROM "user" AS "u" INNER JOIN "post" AS "p" ON (("u"."id" = "p"."userId") AND ("p"."content" IS NOT NULL))
namespace.mysql: SELECT `p`.`content`, `u`.`name` FROM `user` AS `u` INNER JOIN `post` AS `p` ON ((`u`.`id` = `p`.`userId`) AND (`p`.`content` IS NOT NULL))
namespace.mssql: SELECT [p].[content], [u].[name] FROM [user] AS [u] INNER JOIN [post] AS [p] ON (([u].[id] = [p].[userId]) AND ([p].[content] IS NOT NULL))
namespace.oracle: SELECT "p"."content", "u"."name" FROM "user" "u" INNER JOIN "post" "p" ON (("u"."id" = "p"."userId") AND ("p"."content" IS NOT NULL))

select.pg: SELECT "customer"."id" AS "id_alias", "customer"."name" AS "name_alias", "customer"."age" AS "age_alias", "customer"."income" AS "income_alias", "customer"."metadata" AS "metadata_alias" FROM "customer"
select.sqlite: SELECT "customer"."id" AS "id_alias", "customer"."name" AS "name_alias", "customer"."age" AS "age_alias", "customer"."income" AS "income_alias", "customer"."metadata" AS "metadata_alias" FROM "customer"

shortcut.pg: SELECT * FROM "post" WHERE ((("post"."content" IS NULL) OR ("post"."content" = $1)) AND ("post"."userId" = $2))
shortcut.sqlite: SELECT * FROM "post" WHERE ((("post"."content" IS NULL) OR ("post"."content" = $1)) AND ("post"."userId" = $2))
shortcut.mysql: SELECT * FROM `post` WHERE (((`post`.`content` IS NULL) OR (`post`.`content` = ?)) AND (`post`.`userId` = ?))
shortcut.mssql: SELECT * FROM [post] WHERE ((([post].[content] IS NULL) OR ([post].[content] = @1)) AND ([post].[userId] = @2))
shortcut.oracle: SELECT * FROM "post" WHERE ((("post"."content" IS NULL) OR ("post"."content" = :1)) AND ("post"."userId" = :2))

subquery.pg: ("user"."name" IN (SELECT "customer"."name" FROM "customer" WHERE ("user"."name" IN (SELECT "customer"."name" FROM "customer" WHERE ("user"."name" LIKE $1)))))
subquery.sqlite: ("user"."name" IN (SELECT "customer"."name" FROM "customer" WHERE ("user"."name" IN (SELECT "customer"."name" FROM "customer" WHERE ("user"."name" LIKE $1)))))
subquery.mysql: (`user`.`name` IN (SELECT `customer`.`name` FROM `customer` WHERE (`user`.`name` IN (SELECT `customer`.`name` FROM `customer` WHERE (`user`.`name` LIKE ?)))))
subquery.mssql: ([user].[name] IN (SELECT [customer].[name] FROM [customer] WHERE ([user].[name] IN (SELECT [customer].[name] FROM [customer] WHERE ([user].[name] LIKE @1)))))
subquery.oracle: ("user"."name" IN (SELECT "customer"."name" FROM "customer" WHERE ("user"."name" IN (SELECT "customer"."name" FROM "customer" WHERE ("user"."name" LIKE :1)))))

subquery.pg: ("customer"."name" BETWEEN (SELECT MIN("customer"."name") FROM "customer") AND (SELECT MAX("customer"."name") FROM "customer"))
subquery.sqlite: ("customer"."name" BETWEEN (SELECT MIN("customer"."name") FROM "customer") AND (SELECT MAX("customer"."name") FROM "customer"))
subquery.mysql: (`customer`.`name` BETWEEN (SELECT MIN(`customer`.`name`) FROM `customer`) AND (SELECT MAX(`customer`.`name`) FROM `customer`))
subquery.mssql: ([customer].[name] BETWEEN (SELECT MIN([customer].[name]) FROM [customer]) AND (SELECT MAX([customer].[name]) FROM [customer]))
subquery.oracle: ("customer"."name" BETWEEN (SELECT MIN("customer"."name") FROM "customer") AND (SELECT MAX("customer"."name") FROM "customer"))

subquery.pg: SELECT "limit-users"."name", "post"."tags" FROM (SELECT "user"."id", "user"."name" FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."name" LIMIT 10 OFFSET 10) "limit-users" LEFT JOIN "post" ON ("post"."userId" = "limit-users"."id")
subquery.sqlite: SELECT "limit-users"."name", "post"."tags" FROM (SELECT "user"."id", "user"."name" FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."name" LIMIT 10 OFFSET 10) "limit-users" LEFT JOIN "post" ON ("post"."userId" = "limit-users"."id")
subquery.mysql: SELECT `limit-users`.`name`, `post`.`tags` FROM (SELECT `user`.`id`, `user`.`name` FROM `user` ORDER BY `user`.`name` LIMIT 10 OFFSET 10) `limit-users` LEFT JOIN `post` ON (`post`.`userId` = `limit-users`.`id`)
subquery.mssql: SELECT [limit-users].[name], [post].[tags] FROM (SELECT [user].[id], [user].[name] FROM [user] ORDER BY [user].[name] OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY) [limit-users] LEFT JOIN [post] ON ([post].[userId] = [limit-users].[id])
subquery.oracle: SELECT "limit-users"."name", "post"."tags" FROM (SELECT "user"."id", "user"."name" FROM "user" ORDER BY "user"."name" OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY) "limit-users" LEFT JOIN "post" ON ("post"."userId" = "limit-users"."id")

where-clause.sqlite: SELECT * FROM "user" WHERE (("user"."id" IS NOT NULL) AND ("user"."name" IS NOT NULL))
where-clause.mssql: SELECT * FROM [user] WHERE (([user].[id] IS NOT NULL) AND ([user].[name] IS NOT NULL))
where-clause.oracle: SELECT * FROM "user" WHERE (("user"."id" IS NOT NULL) AND ("user"."name" IS NOT NULL))

where-clause.pg: SELECT * FROM "user" WHERE (("user"."id" IS NOT NULL) AND ("user"."name" IS NOT NULL))
where-clause.mysql: SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE ((`user`.`id` IS NOT NULL) AND (`user`.`name` IS NOT NULL))
